text: Document ID: policy_refund Refund Policy: Customers may request a refund within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are issued to the original payment method. Processing time is typically 5 to 10 business days. Exceptions require manager approval.
Document ID: policy_shipping Shipping Policy: Standard shipping takes 3 to 7 business days. Expedited shipping takes 1 to 2 business days. Shipping fees are non-refundable once an order has shipped.
